definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: We have arrived in Tsuen Wan, please exit from the train, thank you.
sentences.chinese: 本班列車已經抵達荃灣站，請所有乘客落車，多謝。

sentences.english: Thanks for looking after the house while we were away.
sentences.chinese: 多謝我們不在的時候幫我們照看房子。

sentences.english: Thanks to Mr. Li Jing's donation, we will provide free pizza for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 多謝李競先生的捐款，中午將提供免費比薩。

sentences.english: Thanks a lot , but I can do it myself.
He also thanked the exhibition's organising committee headed by Mr John Man and Mrs Irene So.
sentences.chinese: 他並多謝畫展的籌委會共同主席文錫輝及蘇潘慕潔。

sentences.english: If you want to download any pictures, please inform the webmaster. Thank you!
sentences.chinese: 如欲借用本網任何圖文，請先聯絡網主，多謝合作。

sentences.english: Thanks to your help(raises her wine-glass). To our friendship. A:Bottoms up .
sentences.chinese: 多謝你的幫助，爲我們的友誼於杯。

sentences.english: Mrs. Lo thank you for introducing me to Dr. Chung.
sentences.chinese: 盧太多謝你介紹鍾醫生給我。

sentences.english: Many thanks for your letter and enclosures of 12 September.
sentences.chinese: 多謝9月12日的來信和附件。

sentences.english: We have arrived in Tiu Keng Leng, please exit from the train, thank you.
sentences.chinese: 本班列車已經抵達調景嶺站，請所有乘客落車，多謝。

sentences.english: The train for Tiu Keng Leng is arriving, please let passengers exit first. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 往調景嶺列車即將到站，請先讓乘客落車，多謝合作。

sentences.english: Thank you, Xuchang pass Yashi, Shu have no knowledge poet.
sentences.chinese: 多謝許昌傳雅什，蜀都曾未識詩人。

sentences.english: Big Dan advances that don't shower your cat by toilet brush, thank you for your cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 奉大丹諭請勿使用廁所刷幫貓只洗澡，多謝合作。

sentences.english: Please bring this advice with you on the day of the seminar. Thank You.
sentences.chinese: 請帶同此通知書到本中心參加研討會，多謝合作。

definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
